price: 199 et que celui-ci l’eût récité devant eux[980], ils auraient mis en doute son authenticité.
arabic: فَقَرَأَهُۥ عَلَيۡهِم مَّا كَانُواْ بِهِۦ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: faqara-ahu ʿalayhim mā kānū bihi mu'minīna
